markdown:
[Skip to main content](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#main-content) * * * Read this [i](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01GQFQA5AC8RE8MM36C5JZEPD6) ntroduction to [account and website integrations](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01HS9PJWCHRCMGTRJGTWHF41WJ), including how to [search](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01HS9Q6GT520XXKYHJ5M1MVVMX) integrations, [browse](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01HS9Q6GT5MCFAV1GG6HZFCPTJ) integrations, and [activate](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01HS9Q6GT54E3KV12W0E784206) integrations. * * * ## **Accessing the features mentioned in this article** **Where can I find this feature using the top menu?** - Manage > Integrations **What more do I need to use this feature?** - [Admin](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868502205212) permissions to manage integrations. **Which Checkfront version supports this feature - classic items, classic products, or both?** - This feature is available in both our classic version using classic items (Inventory > Items) and our classic version using classic products (Inventory > Products).  → [Learn more about products](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868100241052) | | | | --- | --- | | ![Alert](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868062698140) | Integration availability depends on your account version and plan. See the help articles for account and website integrations for more information.
- [Accessing help articles related to items (classic version)](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868317630876)
- [Accessing help articles related to products (new version)](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/articles/19868214774812) | * * * ## Account and website integrations overview [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations# "Back to top") ![Integrations Main Page](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074653084) The **Integrations** section of your account (Manage > Integrations) displays all Checkfront integrations that are available for activation. The page is arranged into fifteen main categories: _All, Active Integrations, Popular, Accounting, Channels, Communication, Conversion, CRMs, Email, Guest Management, Other, Productivity, Sales, Security,_ and _Website Integration._ You need to click on the integration tile to configure and [activate the integration](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations#h_01HS9Q6GT54E3KV12W0E784206). * * * ## Searching integrations [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations# "Back to top") ![Integrations Search Bar](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074047388) You can search by partial or full integration names using the **Search Integrations** field at the top right of the page. The results automatically filter as you type and show matching integrations in the main window. * * * ## Browsing integrations [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations# "Back to top") ![Integrations Category Browse](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868039656604) View specific category integrations by clicking a category on the left side. * * * ## Activating integrations [Back to top](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/articles/19868062778012-Managing-your-account-and-website-integrations# "Back to top") Follow these steps to activate an integration: 1. Locate and click the integration tile. 2. Fill out any required credentials. 3. Select the **Activate** button within its Add-on Setup modal. Integration tiles with a green checkmark in the top left corner indicate that the integration is active in your account. | | | | --- | --- | | ![Attention](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074075292) | Integrations may require external account credentials to complete setup. | | | | | --- | --- | | ![Learn more](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/article_attachments/19868074732060) | You can find detailed instructions for setting up each integration here:
- [List of supported account integrations](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000563453-Account-Integrations)
- [List of supported website integrations](https://support.checkfront.com/hc/en-us/categories/360000576093-Website-Integrations) |
